title: Kinetic energy-change in kinetic energy from graph

content.question: The graph shows speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> for a <math alttext="0.20 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math> object traveling along a straight, horizontal track. The change in the kinetic energy of the object over the time interval shown in the graph is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
